paragraph.taxonomicName: Thaumatophyllum xanadu (Croat, Mayo & J. Boos) Sakur., Calazans & Mayo

subSubSection.paragraph: Philodendron xanadu Croat, Mayo & J. Boos, Aroideana 25: 63. 2002 publ. 2003.

Philodendron xanadu Type. origin unknown, based on plant cultivated in Wellington, West Palm Beach, Florida, T.B. Croat 81537 (holotype: K; isotypes: B, F, COL, GH, INPA, K, MO, NY, R, RSA, SP, TRIN, UB, US).
